pages.text: A Blade replica which has a bit Power of Stars.$(br2)It is one of the imitations of a legendary Blade of an extraordinary smith.$(br2)Minotaurs bring these Blades, too. However, they are not swordsman.
Find Minotaur in the Twilight Forest, then slay it.

The geniune Yasha, the famous Blade which has the true Power of Stars, lost its original shealth, and only its white shealth is saved.$(br2)The real masterpiece of straight Blade. Now Minoshroom holds it.$(br2)It is the Blade's disgrace to be owned by such a monster.
Find Minoshroom in the Twilight Forest, then slay it.
